posts.post_title: FS/FT: PSA 6 & PSA 7 White Sox HOF
posts.post_content:
Hello,

The cards listed below are available for the price listed.  Duffy is with me in Chicago and Davis is at the PWCC vault which is where I will ship from.  Price is net to me and includes shipping and insurance.  I am also open to trading for Zach Wheat, Bill Dahlen, Clark Griffith or Miller Huggins cards of similar grade.  Due to recent shenanigans I will request references if using PayPal.  Feel free to email me or message on here with any questions.

Cards for sale

1) George Davis P150 PSA 7 - $3500
2) Hugh Duffy P460/25 PSA 6 - $2200

If you take both, 10% discount.

Paul Curlee
915-449-7623
